item.title: True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 3
item.description:
Title: True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 3
Genre: Adventure , Casual
Developer: Goblinz Enterprises Ltd
Publisher: The Digital Lounge
Franchise: True Fear: Forsaken Souls
Release Date: Apr 21, 2025




About This Game

"True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 3" is the final chapter of the acclaimed psychological thriller trilogy. Featuring point-and-click mechanics, challenging puzzles, cinematic cutscenes and a uniquely dark atmosphere, the final installment answers all the questions and brings the journey to the epic conclusion. Prepare to immerse yourself in a richly crafted horror experience that pushes the boundaries of the genre and face the demon that haunts the Stonehouse family.
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 1.5Ghz CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 1.5Ghz CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: Cornerpond
item.description:
Title: Cornerpond
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: foolsroom
Publisher: foolsroom
Release Date: Apr 21, 2025




About This Game

A chill fishing idler game that sits in the corner of your screen. Play at your own pace as you work on other tasks!

Visit 5 unique biomes and catch over 100+ types of fish!

Buy upgrades to your rod and bait to catch even bigger and better fish!

Customize your avatar the way you want!

Try to find every fish and fill up your journal!

Gameplay

  • Your character automatically catches fish

  • Occasionally, a big catch might require your attention!

  • Sell your fish to earn money for upgrades and cosmetics

  • Visit all the biomes and try to catch all the fish to complete your journal!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
    • Processor: 2 GHz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible
    • Storage: 200 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Farming & Supermarket Simulator
item.description:
Title: Farming & Supermarket Simulator
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Bull Games
Publisher: Bull Games
Franchise: Bull Games
Release Date: Apr 21, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 21, 2025




About This Game

"Farming & Supermarket Simulator" is a delightful simulation game where you build a farm, grow organic products, feed your animals, and expand your business by selling your products in your supermarket.

Grow, Harvest, Use

Make the best use of your harvested products: either fill the supermarket shelves or use them as feed for your animals. The choice is yours!


Feed and Collect

Feed your animals and reap the rewards! Feed your chicken a tomato, collect fresh eggs, and enjoy the fruits of your labor.

Invest in Machines

Expand your production by purchasing machines! Process your harvested goods to produce valuable items for your supermarket.

Cashier

Quickly scan items, accept payments in cash or credit, and ensure your customers leave happy with their shopping experience!


Work Smart

Quickly move your product crates to the market, fill the shelves, and meet your customers' demands!

Supermarket Expansion

Grow your supermarket with the money you earn! More space, more products, and more customers mean more sales. Strategically organize your shelves and highlight popular products.

Farm Expansion

Think your farm is too small? Then expand it further. Open more farmland, purchase new machines, and increase animal diversity to grow your farm.

"Farming & Supermarket Simulator" will show you how enjoyable managing both a farm and a supermarket can be. Set your strategy, grow step by step, and achieve success. Enjoy this detailed and delightful gaming experience and become the owner of a large farm and supermarket chain!

AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

Some of the images on our store page were created by artificial intelligence and edits were made on the images. and some images in the game were made by artificial intelligence.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
    • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 3 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
    • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 6 GB available space

item.title: FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves
item.description:
Title: FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves
Genre: Action
Developer: SNK CORPORATION
Publisher: SNK CORPORATION
Franchise: FATAL FURY
Release Date: Apr 21, 2025




About This Game

SNK’s beloved Fatal Fury series first hit the market in 1991, spearheading the fighting game boom of the 1990s that swept the industry thereafter. GAROU: MARK OF THE WOLVES (released in 1999) has, for some time, served as the franchise’s most recent installment. But that is all about to change: 26 years on, a brand-new entry—FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves—is set to arrive on the scene!

■All-new REV System supercharges the excitement!

Introducing the REV System, a brand-new toolset that offers unique offensive options from the moment the battle begins! Use REV Arts, REV Accel, REV Blows (while S.P.G. is active), and more until you hit your limit and the REV Meter overheats. The all-new REV System—fight at full throttle and supercharge the excitement!

■Two control schemes—fun for newcomers and veterans alike!
Choose from two control schemes: Arcade Style is based on precise, technical inputs, while Smart Style lets you perform flashy special moves and combos using directional inputs and single button presses. From fighting game newcomers to seasoned veterans, there’s plenty of fun and excitement to be had—tailored specifically to your level!

■Memorable fighters from far and wide descend on the streets of South Town!

The action kicks off with a total of 22 characters: a diverse 17-member roster of familiar faces and new blood, plus five DLC fighters in Season Pass 1. Every character is vibrantly presented in CotW's unique art style, which is guaranteed to stimulate the senses.

■Strive for supremacy in EPISODES OF SOUTH TOWN, a single-player RPG mode!
Introducing “Episodes of South Town” (EOST)—a solo RPG adventure where you’ll square up against contenders under various fight conditions, earning XP and other rewards for your efforts. Level up your fighter, build out a diverse kit of skills, and dominate the opposition on your way to the top. Dreams and ambitions run rampant in South Town; now is the time to chase the city’s crown and carve a legend all of your own!

* To play EOST you’ll first need to connect to the Internet and update the game.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX1060 (VRAM 6GB) / Radeon RX 580 (VRAM 4GB)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 60 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: RTX2070 / Radeon RX 5700XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 60 GB available space

item.title: Tower Unite
item.description:
Title: Tower Unite
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , Massively Multiplayer , Racing
Developer: PixelTail Games
Publisher: PixelTail Games
Release Date: Apr 19, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 8, 2016




About This Game

Tower Unite is a living, evolving world, fueled by the community. Play online games with your friends or make new friends from around the world!

Tower Unite is a large online multiplayer game that spans several genres.

  • Play fully featured minigames such as Minigolf, Accelerate, Ball Race, Virus, Zombie Massacre, and more!

  • Hang out and enjoy various games at the virtual theme park filled with activities and games called the Plaza!

  • Play over 30 unique Arcade games with multiplayer support!

  • Build unique creations and share your creativity with your friends!

  • Customize yourself with accessories and Workshop player models

  • Party with friends!

  • Create custom models and import them directly to the game with Steam Workshop

  • Create custom levels to share and play

  • Earn over 3,000 unique & interactive items

  • Watch synchronized media from YouTube and Soundcloud

  • Play Emulators & create custom arcades with Libretro built-in

  • Rank up and earn achievements and items

  • Suggest new features - we listen!

  • No microtransactions or subscription fees. Every content update is free

  • We're constantly updating the game with new features and content

DO MORE THAN OTHER VIRTUAL WORLD GAMES

Tower Unite isn't just a walk-around-and-chat simulator. You can run, jump, crouch, use jetpacks, get drunk, dance, sit, throw-up, lounge in pool tubes, drive vehicles and much much more.

Tower Unite has many games to play, with more to come, such as...

  • Online multiplayer minigolf with up to 16 players

  • 13 courses with 18 holes (234 holes total) and more in the works!

  • Based on the original 2009 minigolf hit from GMod Tower that inspired many minigolf games

  • Unique controls (100% skill, no timers)

  • Hole-in-one fireworks!

  • Wear tiny hats & glasses on your golf ball

  • Putt through a dinosaur land, candy land, computers, snowy mountains, gardens, pirate ships, skies, and even space!

  • Simultaneous putting (everyone putts at once!)

  • Single player mode available

  • Player hosted servers

  • Online multiplayer FPS arena shooter with up to 12 players

  • 30+ unique weapons to blast opponents with

  • 5 arena levels, with more in the works!

  • Various gametypes such as CTF, Team Deathmatch, Instagib, Dino Battle, and more!

  • Play as any character using Steam Workshop

  • Player hosted servers

  • Online multiplayer Kart racer with up to 10 players

  • 14 unique items to knock out the competition with

  • 8 scenic tracks to speed through, with more in the works!

  • Play as any character using Steam Workshop

  • Single player mode available

  • Player hosted servers

  • Online multiplayer ball racing with up to 16 players

  • 12 unique worlds and more in the works!

  • Speed roll around in a giant ball

  • Carefully maneuver around tricky obstacles

  • Single player mode available

  • Player hosted servers

  • Up to 8 players online

  • 7 unique levels and more in the works!

  • Thrilling 1 vs All gameplay

  • Become the Dragon and devour the knights

  • Attempt turn off the rampaging Dragon as one of the knights

  • Player hosted servers

  • Online multiplayer top down shooter with up to 6 players

  • 6 unique levels and more in the works!

  • Co-operative shooting action

  • Survive waves of zombies and monsters

  • 6 unique character classes with their own powerful abilities

  • 32 overpowered zombie massacring weapons

  • Boss battles

  • Single player mode available

  • Player hosted servers

  • Online multiplayer FPS with up to 12 players

  • 7 unique levels to survive the inevitable infection in and more in the works!

  • Fast paced old school first person shooting action

  • Blast infected away with 10 high-tech sci-fi weapons

  • Team tag elimination, with weapons

  • Player hosted servers

Hang out and enjoy various games at the Plaza! The Plaza is a massive place filled with activities and games that can all be enjoyed in one place. It's like a virtual theme park filled with multiplayer games. Everything in the Plaza is multiplayer so you can participate with all the activities with your friends or make new friends!

The Plaza features many activities such as:

  • Arcade - Play over 30 fully featured multiplayer Arcade games and win tickets and prizes

  • Boardwalk Games - Play various carnival games such as Bumper Cars, Water Blasters, Roll & Race, and more with friends!

  • Nightclub - Listen to music with Soundcloud and YouTube support. Enjoy billiards and bar drinks as well!

  • Casino - Gamble with players at slot machines, horse betting, roulette, bingo, blackjack, video poker, video blackjack, spin-to-win, texas hold'em, and five card draw

  • Fishing - Fish up over 100 unique fish in a unique fishing minigame

  • Bowling - Bowl with friends and enjoy media at the same time

  • Laser Tag - Play fast-paced team laser tag

  • Trivia - Answer various up-to-date questions submitted by our community

  • Theater - Watch synchronized YouTube or SoundCloud

  • Typing Derby - Type as quickly as you can and race to the finish

  • Boardwalk Rides - Ride a rollercoaster or relax and catch the views on a ferris wheel with your friends

  • Dark Ride - Ride a spooky dark ride and blast away ghouls and ghosts with friends on the Dark Voyage

  • Minigames & Events - Participate in dozens of quick minigames such as Balloon Shoot, Plane Wars, and more!

  • Seasonal Events such as Summer, Halloween, Easter, and Winter Holidays - Collect limited time items and celebrate various holidays.

  • Unlock items at in-game stores - Unlock thousands of new items at 30 different in-game stores

Build unique creations and share your creativity with your friends! Easily display images from the internet and import custom models. Customize wallpapers, lights, time of day, and weather to set the perfect mood. Enjoy sync'd YouTube videos and music from SoundCloud. Interact with over 3000 unique items, such as playable pianos and basketball.

  • Place and scale tons of different furniture and items in any arrangement you desire

  • Display images from the internet directly in the game (synced with online players)

  • Build unique and vast creations

  • Customize wallpapers, lights, time of day, and weather

  • Invite friends to party, chat, voice chat, drink, and eat virtual pizza!

  • Watch synchronized media such as YouTube and SoundCloud

  • Build and share Condos with your friends!

  • Play instruments like a piano, drums, or guitar with full MIDI support

  • Interact with over a thousand various weird and cool items

  • Get a pet cat, dog, fish, or w a t e r m e l o n

  • Import your own furniture through modding tools and full Workshop support

  • Play multiplayer games of various genres online with friends

  • Play online Minigolf with up to 16 players

  • Play online kart racing with up to 10 players

  • Create custom models and import them directly to the game with Steam Workshop

  • Customize yourself with lots of accessories

  • Dance at a Nightclub with billiard tables and synchronized visualizers

  • Furnish and design your own home with furniture, interactive toys, and modding support

  • Invite other players over to your Condo for parties and mini-games

  • Watch synchronized YouTube videos or Soundcloud music in a virtual theater or your personal Condo

  • Fly around in jetpacks

  • Create or play custom levels

  • Join official servers or host your own server

  • Play Emulators & create custom arcades with Libretro built-in

  • Hang out with your friends or find new friends!

  • Enjoy free updates, no microtransactions, and developer support

  • Collect tons of unique items with Steam Inventory support

Game featured in screenshots: DUCKSTROMA by AB-UltraNarwhal

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit)
    • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DX10 Compatible GPU with 2 GB VRAM
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 30 GB available space
    • VR Support: SteamVR
    • Additional Notes: Integrated graphic cards will have trouble running the game. Disk space will increase over time due to new content added.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GPU with 4 GB VRAM
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 32 GB available space
